ref: 6389 dukūlá m. ʻ a kind of plant ʼ Hariv., n. ʻ fine cloth made of the inner bark of this plant ʼ MBh., dugūla -- n. lex.
Pa. dukūla -- n. ʻ a partic. kind of fine cloth ʼ,
Si. dūl ʻ the fibrous plant Anodedron paniculatum, its fibre ʼ, diyul, duhul ʻ fine cloth made from this fibre ʼ. --
B. duli ʻ a hood or shawl fastened round neck and covering head and ears ʼ? <-> Still more doubtful is
Kho. (Lor.) dugulo siri ʻ a kind of barley ʼ.
